    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StartEndTimePopup

    public class DialogBoxWithCloseButton
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DialogBox
    Extended DialogBox widget with close button inside the pop-up header
    Author:
    L.Pelov Slight modification to have a hardcoded close image. Original code from: http://code.google.com/p/wcinteractions/source/browse/trunk/MVP/ src/com/mvp/client/ui/widget/DialogBoxExt.java Modification to allow custom centring, Guy Griffiths

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void center()
      This centres the dialog box, but uses a DialogBoxWithCloseButton.CentrePosIF to define the centre position (so that for example we can centre this box over a map, or other widget)
